DataElement.preferredName: Baseline Personal Medical History Physical Examination Chronic Medication Administration Flag java.lang.Integer
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A starting point to which things may be compared.:A record of a patient's background regarding health and the occurrence of disease events of the individual.  In addition, personal medical history may be a variable in epidemiologic studies.:A systemic evaluation of the body and its functions using visual inspection, palpation, percussion, and auscultation, aimed to determine the presence or absence of physical signs of disease or abnormality for individual's health assessment._A disease or condition that persists or progresses over a long period of time.:A drug or medicine that treats or prevents or alleviates the symptoms of disease.:The act of the dispensing, applying, or tendering of something to another, such as administration of a medicine.:An indicator that can be set or unset in order to signal whether a particular condition is true._Generic value domain for a primitive java dataype that is an Integer (32-bit two's complement).

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Baseline Personal Medical History Physical Examination Chronic Medication Administration Flag
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A starting point to which things may be compared.:A record of a patient's background regarding health and the occurrence of disease events of the individual.  In addition, personal medical history may be a variable in epidemiologic studies.:A systemic evaluation of the body and its functions using visual inspection, palpation, percussion, and auscultation, aimed to determine the presence or absence of physical signs of disease or abnormality for individual's health assessment._A disease or condition that persists or progresses over a long period of time.:A drug or medicine that treats or prevents or alleviates the symptoms of disease.:The act of the dispensing, applying, or tendering of something to another, such as administration of a medicine.:An indicator that can be set or unset in order to signal whether a particular condition is true.

ObjectClass.preferredName: Baseline Personal Medical History Physical Examination
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A starting point to which things may be compared.:A record of a patient's background regarding health and the occurrence of disease events of the individual.  In addition, personal medical history may be a variable in epidemiologic studies.:A systemic evaluation of the body and its functions using visual inspection, palpation, percussion, and auscultation, aimed to determine the presence or absence of physical signs of disease or abnormality for individual's health assessment.

Concepts.definition: A starting point to which things may be compared.
A record of a patient's background regarding health and the occurrence of disease events of the individual. In addition, personal medical history may be a variable in epidemiologic studies.

A systemic evaluation of the body and its functions using visual inspection, palpation, percussion and auscultation. The purpose is to determine the presence or absence of physical signs of disease or abnormality for an individual's health assessment.

Property.preferredDefinition: A disease or condition that persists or progresses over a long period of time.:A drug or medicine that treats or prevents or alleviates the symptoms of disease.:The act of the dispensing, applying, or tendering of something to another, such as administration of a medicine.:An indicator that can be set or unset in order to signal whether a particular condition is true.

Concepts.definition: Usually used to describe a condition that is persistent and long standing.

A drug product that contains one or more active and/or inactive ingredients; it is intended to treat, prevent or alleviate the symptoms of disease. This term does not refer to the individual ingredients that make up the product.
The act of the dispensing, applying, or tendering of something to another, such as administration of a medicine.
An indicator that can be set or unset in order to signal whether a particular condition is true.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Default Conceptual Domain for UML Loader

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: 1/1/11 Released as part of Lymphoma Enterprise Architecture Data System (LEADS) model cleanup.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Generic value domain for a primitive java dataype that is an Integer (32-bit two's complement).

ConceptualDomain.changeDescription: 10.14.20 TL changed WFS from DRAFT NEW to RETIRED ARCHIVED and added an End Date in preparation of OneData.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Number; a concept of quantity derived from zero and units; a numeral or string of numerals that is used for identification.

Concepts.definition: A numeral or string of numerals expressing value, quantity, or identification.
